name: Milton Ek
description: Flatmate with Sky since years back. Sky is to Milton the most important person in his life.

name: Sky Goldscheider
description: Sky has lost conection with their family due to personal reasons. Milton is like a family to Sky and they would do anything for them.

name: Neo Faneva
description: An old friend to Sky that nowdays owns a coffe shop

name: Francine Bennett
description: Outgoing girl working as waitress at the Bean' There Barista.

name: Sasha Vasiliev
description: Girlfriend to Paz, tries to slowly move on from Paz Esparza's death.

name: Hyeon Yun
description: A shark with information about Paz's death. Owner of the restaurant CodFather.

name: London York
description: Suspect to be the same eagle who killed Paz Esparza, works in the same company.

name: Bion Evans
description: Newly graduated from polytechnics, despite young age already skilled in bomb clearing.
A thief first spotted outside Jay's Jewelery.
